src:
Peter Cehlárik sa vracia do NHL, Boston ho povolal z farmy v Providence
02 Nov 2019, 09:35 by Webnoviny
2.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) – Slovenský hokejový útočník Peter Cehlárik je po necelom týždni späť v prvom tíme zámorskej NHL Boston Bruins. Dvadsaťštyriročný odchovanec žilinského hokeja debutoval v tejto sezóne v profilige v nedeľňajšom súboji proti New Yorku Rangers, v ktorom odohral 12:05 min a vedenie klubu vzápätí poslalo späť do farmárskeho tímu Providence Bruins v AHL. Informácie priniesol reportér Mark Divver na webe cbssports.com.
V NHL zatiaľ Cehlárik v tomto ročníku nebodoval, v AHL má v siedmich dueloch bilanciu šesť gólov a štyri asistencie. V Bostone je kapitánom tímu obranca Zdeno Chára a chytá zaň brankár Jaroslav Halák.
Viac k témam: AHL, NHLZdroj: Webnoviny.sk – Peter Cehlárik sa vracia do NHL, Boston ho povolal z farmy v Providence © SITA Všetky práva vyhradené.
text:
Peter Cehlárik returns to the NHL, Boston called him from a farm in Providence
02 Nov 2019, 09:35 by Webnoviny
2.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) - Slovak hockey striker Peter Cehlárik is back in the first team of overseas NHL Boston Bruins after less than a week. Twenty-four-year-old Zilina hockey rookie debuted this season in a profile match on Sunday against the New York Rangers, where he played 12:05 min and the club management immediately sent back to the Providence Bruins farm team in AHL. Information was provided by reporter Mark Divver at cbssports.com.
In the NHL so far Cehlárik has not scored this year, in the AHL has seven goals in six goals and four assists. The defender is replaced by Zdeno Chára and the goalkeeper Jaroslav Halák catches the team.
More on the topics: AHL, NHLSource: Webnoviny.sk - Peter Cehlárik returns to the NHL, Boston called him from a farm in Providence © SITA All rights reserved.
